snippet: The authorities said they believed that arsonists, possibly with a far-right motive, were behind the fires that destroyed three buildings near Nuremberg.
abstract: German police suspect arsonists are behind series of fires that destroyed buildings in village near Nuremberg that were to welcome several dozen refugees.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said they believed that arsonists, possibly with a far-right motive, were behind the fires that destroyed three buildings near Nuremberg.

headline.main: German Police Suspect Arson in Destruction of Refugee Shelters
